comments.mode: Set to 'full' for complete scraping or 'incremental' for only new articles
comments.max_workers: Number of concurrent scrapers to run (1-10 recommended)
comments.max_pages_per_scraper: Maximum pages to scrape per source in incremental mode
comments.skip_existing: Skip articles already in database (true recommended)
comments.skip_threshold: Stop scraping after N consecutive duplicate articles found
comments.enable_skip_logic: Enable early termination when skip threshold is reached
comments.auto_merge: Automatically run merged_news.py after all scrapers complete
comments.merge_date_filter: Only merge articles from this date onwards (YYYY-MM-DD)
comments.enabled_scrapers: Set to 'all' or provide array of scraper names to enable
comments.disabled_scrapers: Array of scraper names to disable (overrides enabled_scrapers)
